text: aur use rasool vah vakt bhee yaad (dilao) jab tumhaare paravaradigaar ne aadam kee aulaad se bastiyon se (baahar nikaal kar) unakee aulaad se khud unake muqaabale mein eqaraar kar liya (poochha) ki kya main tumhaara paravaradigaar nahin hoon to sab ke sab bole haan ham usake gavaah hain ye hamane isalie kaha ki aisa na ho kaheen tum qayaamat ke din bol utho ki ham to usase bilkul be khabar the
